Installation failed for me, two files inside the iso, core_data.rar, core_env.rar seem to be corrupted.

I found a solution to fix the installation failed problem with this torrent.

I did this with uTorrent 2.2 (build 23703)

1. Extract this rar to a desired folder

2. Download http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6228419/Dragon_Age_2-RELOADED

3. Set the download location for this new torrent to the same folder where you have the rld-dag2.iso file

uTorrent would download the remaining missing blocks for the iso

see my earlier comment for the details of corrupted rar files in iso.

iso file size 6.59 GB (7,082,606,592 bytes)

Now the setup should complete without errors.
